page.description: Copies a file from one location to another on the file system.

argument.name: srcFilepath
argument.description: Local file URL for the file to be copied.

argument.name: destDirpath
argument.description: The URL of the directory to copy the file.

argument.name: destFilename
argument.description: The file name for the copied file. If *[js:null]*, the source filename will be used.

argument.name: onCopySuccess
argument.description: A javascript function that is called if the file is successfully copied.

argument.name: onError
argument.description: A javascript function that is called if an error occurs when copying the file.
